element.name: Heliana’s Guide to Monster Hunting to Monster Hunting
element.description: Heliana’s Guide to Monster Hunting to Monster Hunting is a 600-page tome packed with exciting new content to enhance your 5E game. Discover lethally thrilling adventures; rules for tracking, harvesting, and crafting; and a humongous hoard of fully-illustrated items, monsters, spells, and player options. Battle deadly, multi-stage boss monsters and forge fantastic new items and familiars from their remains.
